title: GoodRx: Prescription Coupons
description:
The affordable healthcare and medication app – that’s GoodRx. Get discount options for prescription drugs, perks when buying meds, and reliable telehealth services. Enjoy an Rx app that brings complete virtual care to the palm of your hand - medication tracker, pill reminder, and more. Our free digital coupons help you save more than savings from health insurance or Medicare. 

 GoodRx was made with health equity in mind. Our free prescription discount finder has everything you need from personal medication tracker to pill reminder and rewards on prescriptions. Get health benefits like discounts on medicine, senior care, and more on the prescription drug savings app trusted by millions of Americans.

Enjoy everything from medication reminder features to Rx savings solutions for a complete mobile health care app without insurance. Make the most of your healthcare with your own medication list, pill tracker, drug guide & price check. Monitor prescriptions easily with our medicine tracker and pill reminder. Save money with mobile coupons and find a doctor on the personal healthcare app made for you.

Download GoodRx today to save on your medication and become your own healthcare advocate!

GoodRx Features:

Digital Coupons at Over 70,000 Locations
- CVS Pharmacy
- Walmart Pharmacy
- HEB Pharmacy
- Walgreens Pharmacy
- Rite Aid Pharmacy
- Target Pharmacy
- Safeway Pharmacy
- Vons Pharmacy
- Kroger Pharmacy
- & more!

Medication App With Prescriptions Up To 80% Off
- Rx savings solutions: Find the savingson drugs with our free coupons app
- Check Rx pharmacy prices and redeem digital coupons to claim your prescription discount
- Get an Rx app with free coupons that help you save money
- Our health app offers discounts on pet meds to cover your furry friend
- Discount finder for meds with mobile coupons you can use at a local pharmacy
- Healthcare app with manufacturer medication discounts, patient assistance programs & more
- Visit your preferred pharmacy or Rx discount location to save on medications

Pill Reminder & Free Medication Tracker
- Medication reminder: Our pill tracker makes refills easy thanks to pill reminder alerts
- Medicine tracker: Get a free medication list to help manage medications
- Pill tracker: Our medication reminder monitors birth control prescriptions, medicine, and more

Complete Health Care Tool
- Medication list with a drug guide for your prescriptions
- Get affordable, virtual care now with online medical professionals
- No Medicare, Medicaid, or health insurance needed – find a doctor seamlessly
- Find telehealth support and understand your meds and prescription list
- Medication delivery & pickup available anywhere

GoodRx Care services include
- Urinary Tract Infection (UTI) treatment
- Erectile Dysfunction (ED)
- Birth control medication & refills
- Short term medication refill
- & more!

Prescription Discount Finder Trusted by Millions
- Digital coupons made easy for everyone
- Our medication app shows the Rx pharmacy with savingson drugs or even free
- Healthcare professionals across the country use our coupons app to help patients save money
- Featured by: The New York Times, PBS, ABC News, Forbes, CNN, Good Morning America, The LA Times & more!

Upgrade to GoodRx Gold to earn rewards for additional discounts, benefits, and offers. Get exclusive pricing and reliable mobile health care with GoodRx Gold.

By downloading GoodRx, you agree to be bound by our Terms Of Use. Read more at http://www.goodrx.com/terms-of-use

Please visit https://www.goodrx.com/consumer-health-data-privacy-notice to read our Consumer Health Data Privacy Notice for additional information about our handling of consumer health data.

*GoodRx works to make its apps accessible to all, including those with disabilities. If you are having difficulty accessing this application, please call or email us at (855) 268-2822 or ada@goodrx.com so that we can provide you with the services you require through alternative means

summary: Save up to 80% on prescription medications. Compare prices, find coupons & save.
